short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension is developed for https://www.crowdcast.io/. It doesn't do anything except capture content of your screen.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is used by Crowdcast https://www.crowdcast.io/ to capture the content of your screen when using the "Screensharing" feature of a Crowdcast event!
